title: Obasan - complex attitude toward the past

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Kogawa uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex attitude toward the past.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Kogawa uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex attitude toward the past.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
